encrypt_decrypt module¶

class encrypt_decrypt.EncryptDecrypt¶

Bases : object

When a game is saved, the XML representation of the game is « encrypted » to prevent cheating (i.e. manually modifying the players” hands and the board). The « encryption » is done by creating an « .enc » file where each character of the XML file is replaced with its hexadecimal ASCII value. The original file is removed.

static ascii_string_to_hex(input_string)¶

Converts each character of an ASCII string to its 2-digit hex value and returns the string. Each character representation is separated by a space.

Paramètres

input_string (str) –

Renvoie

output_string

Type renvoyé

str

  • target_ext (str ('xml' in most cases)) –

static encrypt_and_store_file(path_to_original_file)¶

Reads the file, encrypts it and stores the encrypted version. It also removes the original file.
